example.text: This resolution would increase levels of pollution in our waterbodies, increase risk of downstream flooding, and make it harder for communities like mine to maintain sustainable sources of drinking water. Worst of all, hardworking American families would have to pay for the horrible impacts of this resolution.

Our Mental Health Caucus was glad to co-host with the [[user]] a roundtable this morning with [[user]] to discuss local mental health issues. I’m grateful to [[user]] & all of LA County for continuing to work with us to improve mental health services for all residents. [[url]]

Proud to have welcomed distinguished [[user]] commissioner, Camille Touton, for the WWF Subcommittee hearing on the President's FY24 budget. Looking forward to continuing to work w/ the Bureau protect our drinking water supply, through robust investments for water recycling & reuse. [[url]]

A border wall won't stop the flow of drugs into our country. It won't reform our immigration system. It's an expensive, ineffective symbol of fear and division. I’m voting NO on the Child Deportation Act.

"I thank Chairs Rosa DeLauro, Marcy Kaptur, and all of the other appropriators for working with me and recognizing the importance of funding these programs for all Americans." The legislation consists of all 12 Fiscal Year 2023 appropriations bills and supplemental funding to support Ukraine.

A border wall won't stop the flow of drugs into our country. It won't reform our immigration system. It's an expensive, ineffective symbol of fear and division. I’m voting NO on the Child Deportation Act.
